dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: We’re at the final round. You all keeping a good eye on your chips?
Hm, I’m all in.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: …All in?

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Ooh~ Dealt a nice hand, huh, Rodya?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Hah~ That swagger of yours’s been rubbin’ me the wrong way, y’know that? You’re pushin’ yourself to the edge, so what’re you counting on?
I’m the kind of gal who bets everything she has at the end.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Stop right there. Pull your sleeve up. Don’t think I didn’t see you bein’ sneaky.
Huh?!

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: You just put one of them wish stickers you got from the Tingtang bossman on your arm.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: You were tryin’ to rake in all the chips this round so you can have the Golden Bough all to yourself.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Look, everyone! Right ‘ere ‘neath her hand, this thing. ‘S got to be the sticker, ey?
…Got proof?

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Sorry, Rodya, but can I take a look at your wrist for a second?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Nah, you aren’t! Don’t you touch ‘er. Far as I know, you two might be in cahoots.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Nooow, I’ll lay ‘er arm bare, so keep your eyes peeled, aight? I knew this sly little fox would play dirty.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Hold on now… This situation… and dialogue… all feel awfully familiar. Have I seen this before somewhere?
Small-minded for someone so big. Do you really have to be petty about this?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: And didn’t they teach you that with stolen wishpower comes strict responsibility?
…You’ve watched too many movies man. What’s stolen?
If you find nothing, will you fold and walk out?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Hah, you’ve got guts. Fine, I’ll bet all my stakes that there’s a piece o’ the wishpower on your wrist. What do you say?
Same as yours. So, one of us is about to go bust then? Scared, are you?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Pahahahah! Oh that’s cute, you get that somewhere? Anyway, that means your words’re final, ey?

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Oh my… This is going exactly how I remember… I’m pretty sure the conclusion was…

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Here goes, let us confirm then~

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Wuhuh? What’s going on ‘ere?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: I saw it. I saw the little fox rub ‘er wrist! There’s—there’s no way…

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: That means you’re out. What a pity.
What happens to the loser, then? Lop off a hand or something?

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: You’re joking, right, Rodya? There’s no point in removing a prosthetic hand.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: No, this is… This can’t be right…

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: The defeated will be shown generosity, but false accusations need to be taken care of with more caution.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Hang on, are you…?
[DEVELOPER COMMENT NOT TO DISPLAY]
Gweh… What in the…!

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: For Wings’ sake, can you PLEASE give me a warning—just a little one!

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Ugh… Look at all the grease and spinal fluid… Bwegh.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Remember, Rodya? It’s a trash compactor we saw at the waste disposal in our Backstreets.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: I told you back then.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: That we proletarians should unite to take down the ruling class and build a new society.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: So then you replied:

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: “If you mean we should round up the rich and flatten ‘em under one of those compactors, then I’m all for it.”
…Small correction: I said “crush and pop ‘em”.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: …Is that so.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Rodya, are you still unwilling to return to the Yurodiviye?
I…
Didn’t you all… hear a loud slam just now?

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Undoubtedly. After a quarrel about… wishpower and the like.
What? Did they find out? Oi, quit gawking and turn that clock.
Gosh, please stop pushing. …Aaah!
Huh, woah—?!
Unfortunately, the door we were leaning against was a flimsy wooden frame covered with rice paper.
We all tumbled into the room as the door fell.
